short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to generate CodeceptJS acceptance tests while using your app.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to record steps as you surf an actual web site or web app in Chrome. The output can be used as-is in scenarios with the CodeceptJS testing framework.
